User Registration Options
New Users automatically get assigned to this Group
entry.translation: Neue Nutzer werden automatisch dieser Gruppe zugeordnet

entry.string: Default Group For New Users:
Allow anonymous users to create accounts
Allow Registration
Users need to be this age or older to register
entry.translation: Nutzer müssen dieses Alter oder älter sein, um sich zu registrieren

entry.string: Minimum Age To Be A User:
Require user email addresses to be typed twice during registration
Require email address to be entered twice
Allow users to choose their own password when registering
entry.translation: Nutzern bei der Registrierung die Wahl ihres eigenen Kennworts gestatten

entry.string: Users May Choose Their Own Password
entry.translation: Nutzer dürfen ihr eigenes Kennwort wählen

entry.string: Users must choose passwords with at least this many characters
entry.translation: Nutzer müssen ein Kennwort wählen mit mindestens dieser Zeichenanzahl

entry.string: Minimum Password Length:
Notify Admin when users create an account
entry.translation: Den Administrator über die Registrierung benachrichtigen

entry.string: Send Notice To Admin Upon User Registration
Email address for admin notification
Email for notification to Admin
Administrator must approve and activate new user accounts
User Activation Requires Administrator Approval
Users must confirm their accounts via confirmation code
Require Validation Of New Users
Allow users to enter dynamic property values during account creation process
Show Dynamic Properties On Registration (if enabled)
Users can be notified when their account has been created
Send Welcome Email On Successful Registration Of User
Require each user account to have a distinct email address
Email Address Must Be Unique To Each Registered User
Allow users to be hidden in user list
Allow Users To Be Invisible In Users List
Further email notifications for user role changes made specifically by Administrators (not this Registration process) can be made in the Roles Messaging configuration.
Filtering Options
User names to which cannot be used
entry.translation: Nutzernamen, die nicht verwendet werden dürfen

entry.string: Disallowed User Names:
Note: Enter each name on a single line. Do not separate with comma, etc
entry.translation: Geben Sie jeden Eintrag in einer eigenen Zeile ein. Verwenden Sie keine Trennzeichen.

entry.string: Email addresses which cannot be used
entry.translation: E-Mailadressen, die nicht verwendet werden dürfen

entry.string: Disallowed Email Addresses:
Deny access the site from these IP addresses
entry.translation: Zugang zur Webseite für folgende IP-Adressen verweigern
